text: Kevin Metheny (c. 1954 â€“ October 3, 2014) was an American radio executive. He was played by Paul Giamatti in the 1997 movie, Private Parts. His final job in the radio industry was as operations manager of KGO-AM/KSFO-AM (San Francisco). Metheny died in San Francisco, California from a suspected heart attack, aged 60. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American radio personalities Category:American television presenters Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Disease-related deaths in San Francisco Category:Businesspeople from San Francisco
title: Kevin Metheny
